events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't updated in days.
The system categorized the complaint as a delivery delay issue based on keywords such as delayed shipping and no update on tracking.
The support ticket was assigned to a customer service representative for further assistance regarding the delivery delay.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help with your delayed order and will do my best to resolve the issue quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking ID so I can check the shipment status with our carrier?
Sure, my order number is 458793 and the tracking ID is TRK123456789. The tracking page hasn’t updated for over a week.
I have contacted the shipping company on your behalf and they confirmed the package is delayed due to logistics issues. We expect delivery within the next 3-4 days and will monitor closely.
Thanks for the update. While I’m disappointed, I appreciate you following up quickly and keeping me informed about the delivery status.
Your order was delivered today. Please confirm receipt and let us know if everything is in good condition so we can close this case.
Just following up to ensure you received your order and that you are satisfied with the delivery experience after the delay.
Thank you for confirming receipt. We are closing the case now but please don’t hesitate to contact us again if you have any further issues.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback on our customer service and the handling of your delivery delay.
